titleInfo.title: Tennessee Society to Maintain Segregation correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1955 October 18

mods.abstract: Letter from the Tennesee Society to Maintain Segregation to Raymond B. Witt, chairman of the Chattanooga, Tennessee Board of Education offering a questionnaire for Witt to complete. The questionnaire asks pointed questions regarding public school integration.
